data.eml:eml: Studies on the genus Phasmotaenia Navás, 1907, with the descriptions of five new species from the Solomon Islands, a revised key to the species and notes on its geographic distribution (Phasmatodea: “ Anareolatae ”: Phasmatidae s. l.: Stephanacridini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hennemann, Frank H., Conle, Oskar V. (2009): Studies on the genus Phasmotaenia Navás, 1907, with the descriptions of five new species from the Solomon Islands, a revised key to the species and notes on its geographic distribution (Phasmatodea: “ Anareolatae ”: Phasmatidae s. l.: Stephanacridini). Zootaxa 2011: 1-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.185796
